alert.note: Alert for Appling (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Appling County through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baxley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxley and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
